title: Do management students also get scholarships ??

comments.body: how much did ec campus students get ? if they got CNR cholarship through pessat? please soemoene reply

CNR is 40%
MRD is 50%
( PESSAT fees is 4.8lakhs per year )
do they get 40% or 50% off thier 12 lakhs or is it a cut part that they get off from
It's wt ever x% of your fees as specified in the documents as far as I know
